loans.use: To buy caps, gloves and goggles to sell.

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama  is  a widow and has six children. Even though she did not receive any formal education,  Ama is a successful businesswoman.  She sells smoked fish  in Kufur (near Cape Coast). She has been actively involved in this business for some years now. As the sole breadwinner in the family,  Ama uses her income to provide for the entire family.  Ama will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of fresh fish to smoke for sale, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business,  Ama  plans to further diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of fresh fish to smoke for sale

loans.name: Ayesha

texts.en:
Ayesha, is a 45-year-old married woman who lives with her husband and a daughter in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has a business providing passenger transportation services in his auto rickshaw. Her husband has been doing this work for about eight years. To carry out his work, he gets up very early, because he has to look for passengers on the streets of his city.

Ayesha's husband enjoys his work, because he can manage his free time and have more time to spend with his family. In addition, he is able to obtain very good earnings. Now her husband feels tranquil and comfortable, because he has a regular income and has more free time. This will be Ayesha's first loan with Kiva, and she hopes that with Kiva lender's cooperation her husband will be able to carry out his plans. She promises to make his payments on time.

Ayesha requested a loan so that her husband would be able to pay for the body of the auto rickshaw. Ayesha is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan, for this honor.

loans.use: to do  maintenance on their auto rickshaw body.

loans.name: Fredy Oliver

texts.en: A 24-year-old athletic "Iqueña" (from the Ica region), Fredy is a field worker with a high school education. He enjoys playing football and his favorite food is "arroz chaufa" (Peruvian fried rice). In the next six months, Fredy hopes to begin his degree in mechanical engineering, which will put him on track to achieve his lifelong dream: to become a successful professional. With the Kiva loan, Fredy will purchase a closet for his home, which will help improve the quality of his living situation. He is extremely thankful for the support of Kiva lenders and wants them to know that he will put his loan to good use.

loans.use: to purchase a closet for his home

loans.name: Karina Lisseth

texts.es:
Karina es una joven de 25 años de edad,  vive con su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 8 y 5 años ambos del sexo masculino, los cuales estudian en la escuela pública del caserío, el compañero de vida es agricultor en pequeño. 

Ella se dedica a prestar sus servicios como domestica en la ciudad, actividad que desempeña desde hace ya más de 5 años, se desplaza en bus, recorre la distancia de 35km, con un tiempo estimado de 45 min. El horario es accesible para las demás actividades que realiza, porque además de ese trabajo, realiza actividades de agricultura como tapiscar y la limpia de terrenos.

El crédito lo solicita para comprar lo faltante de pesticidas, abono y pagar lo restante a un mozo que trabaja para ella y concluir la siembra de 14, 000 metros cuadrados de maíz que tienen en proceso. 

El crédito podrá garantizar la alimentación para su familia y con la venta de los excedentes podrá tener ingresos que le permitan garantizarles el estudio a sus hijos.  


Su sueño con ver a sus hijos, como unos profesionales, además desea remodelar parte de su vivienda en un futuro.
texts.en:
Karina is 25 years old, and she lives with her long-term partner and their two sons aged 8 and 5 years old. Both children attend the village school, and Karina's husband is a small-scale farmer.

Karina works primarily as a household servant in the nearby town, and has for over five years now. She takes the bus more than 35km (45 minutes) into town. This schedule means that she is available for the other work she does. In addition to her main job, she also does various jobs on the farm, including working the harvest and clearing the fields.

The loan that she is requesting will be for purchasing the remaining pesticides and fertilizer that she needs and also for paying a boy who works for her in order to finish the harvest of their 3.5 acres of corn that are ready.

The loan will ensure that she and her family remain fed and with the income from the sale of the extra, they will be able to continue to send their children to school.

Karina dreams of seeing her sons become professionals, and would also like to remodel part of her home in the future.

loans.use: purchase materials and labor to complete her corn harvest.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado La Esperanza está en su ciclo número 8vo del programa de comité, ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, y gracias al esfuerzo que cada una está haciendo todas están mejorando en su nivel de pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Lucila quien a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo está mejorando gratamente sus ingresos y está muy contenta con ello. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropas de todo tipo, y comenta que ya se hizo de muy buena clientela, ya que siempre tiene muy buen producto que ofrecer. Hoy solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de jeans, camisas, pantalones y demás para poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The "La Esperanza" (Hope) group is in their eighth loan cycle with the program. They are working toward the goal of eliminating poverty, and thanks to the efforts of each one, everybody is improving their own poverty level.

One of the members is Ms. Lucila, who through her continuous hard work is nicely improving her income, which makes her very happy. Her main line of work is selling all sorts of clothing, and she says that she has established a very nice customer base since she always has a lot of good options to offer them.  The credit she is asking for today will be used to purchase jeans, shirts, pants, and other types of clothing so that she can continue her sales as she has been.

loans.use: purchase jeans, shirts, pants, and more.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is 43 years old, unmarried, and lives in Nimba County in Liberia.  Nimba is one of the most resource-rich areas in Liberia, producing minerals such as iron ore.  The county shares a border with both Cote D’Ivoire and Guinea.  As a result, many people on business pass through the area bringing lots of trade.  It is also the second more populous area in Liberia.
 
Margaret has a shop which has been selling tea and cold water for the past two years.  She works at her business spending 9 hours.  She transports her goods to her business by bus. The biggest challenge she faces in her business is too little merchandise in her shop.  

Margaret went to school and finished grade 12.  Her fiancee is working with youth and sports.  She has five children between 8 and 27 years old. Only two live at home and attend school. 

With the proceeds from the loan she wants to buy more Lipton's tea and water by the sack.  She describes herself as a hardworking woman.  She started her business with money from her mother. In the future, she wants to own a house.  She is proud of her business because she gets money every day for her expenses.
  
Margaret wants to say thanks to the lenders who support BRAC Liberia.

loans.use: to buy more Lipton's tea and drinking water in bags.

loans.name: Kou

texts.en:
Kou is a 35-year-old business woman from Liberia.  She is single and has six children, between the ages of 2 and 20.  She describes herself as hard-working.

Kou lives in Nimba, a county in Liberia that shares a border with Guinea and Cote D’Ivoire.  Because of its status as a border county, trade is the primary activity in the region.  It also has the second highest population in Liberia. 

Kou has a shop selling flour, oil, sugar, soap, etc. for the past four years.  She works 10 hours at her business.  Her greatest challenge in business is that she has a small amount of capital. She intends to use the loan to buy more flour, oil, sugar, soap, etc. for her business. She started her business with money from her mother.  She likes her business because it keeps her busy.  She hopes one day to buy a car.  

She is grateful for your support!

loans.use: to buy more flour, oil, sugar, soap, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Kalsoom

texts.en:
Kalsoom is a 28-year-old married woman, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of three children and equally responsible for all of them. She belongs to an ultra poor family, that is why she cannot afford the educational expenses of all her children. 

One of her sons goes with his father to help him in his business. Her husband owns a blacksmith shop in which he provides welding services. He also provides door to door services to his customers. Due to the increase in the price of iron, he is unable to buy sufficient welding materials such as welding rods, soldering rods, etc. to carry on his business.

To fulfill the demand of his customers and to run his enterprise he needs some capital to buy welding material.  Kalsoom requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband so that he would be able to buy material to carry on his business. 

Kalsoom is very glad and thankful to Kiva and its field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy welding rods, soldering rods, and iron pieces for manufacturing.

loans.name: Akou

texts.fr:
Akou, âgée de 38 ans et mère de quatre enfants, vit dans le quartier de Bè, à Lomé. Elle est la seule personne ayant une source de revenu dans son foyer. Entre 1993 et 2008, elle vend des chaussures et des crèmes pour la peau. 
Mais elle abandonne cette  activité suite à la maladie et au décès de son père, et compte tenu de son déménagement dans un nouveau quartier. 
Depuis 2008, elle fait le commerce de beignets et de brochettes de soja. Elle sollicite ce crédit pour acheter un sac de soja et accroître ses revenus.
texts.en:
Akou, aged 38 and the mother of four children, lives in the  Bè district in Lomé. She is the only bread-winner in her household. From 1993 to 2008, she sold shoes and skin cremes. 

However, she abandoned this activity because of the illness and subsequent death of her father, and in view of the fact that they moved to a new district. Since 2008 she has been selling fried doughnuts and  dumplings roasted on a spit, made of soybeans. She is requesting this loan to buy a sack of soybeans and thus increase her income.

loans.use: to buy a tin of vegetable oil and a sack of soybeans.

loans.name: Maame

texts.en: Although she has received no prior formal education, Maame is an entrepreneur. She specializes in preparing and selling ‘Banku’ (a traditional Ghanaian dish made using fermented corn/cassava dough that is mixed proportionally and cooked in hot water into a smooth whitish consistent paste). She usually sells her ‘Banku’ in Kufur (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in preparing and selling ‘Banku’ for 15 years.  Maame is married and has three children. Her husband works as a carpenter. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and pay their children’s school fees. Maame wants to use her loan to purchase a greater quantity of cassava and maize, thus increasing her current inventory levels. As a result, this will allow her to sell greater quantities of her tasty ‘Banku’. In the long term, Maame plans to reinvest the future profits back into her business, thus helping her expand and meet the rising customer demands.

loans.use: to purchase more cassava and maize to make banku to sell

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en: Ruth is an old client, single and residing in rural Nyamitanga, Mbarara District, dealing in a retail shop. She is facing a challenge of low sales during this season. However she has applied for UGX 3,000,000 to complete payment of the land and carry on agriculture to expand her incomes. She is excited about the partnership with Kiva and is confident her dreams will soon come true. In the photo is Ruth (right) and the Ugafode credit officer at the land she wants to buy.

loans.use: To acquire a piece of land for farming

loans.name: Ekyina

texts.en: Due to difficult circumstances Ekyina did not have access to any form of formal education, yet this has not stopped her from achieving her dream of becoming an entrepreneur. Currently, Ekyina sells smoked fish in Kufur (near Cape Coast). She has been doing so for some years now. She is married to a maison, and together they have six children. Ekyina uses all her income to feed and provide for her family. Ekyina will use the loan to purchase an increased amount of fresh fish to smoke for sale, which will aid her in improving her overall sales. Ekyina wants to use the future profits from her expanded business to ensure that all her children are able to receive an education.

loans.use: to purchase an increased amount of fresh fish to smoke for sale.

loans.name: Annet

texts.en: Annet, a repeat client from Ntungamo town with 3 children operates a hotel. She faces a problem of school fees for her children which she has always failed to fund in time since her income is low. She has applied for UGX 300,000 to pay school fees and pay using income from the hotel.

loans.use: To pay tuition for her children.

loans.name: Farida

texts.en:
Farida is 51 years old and the mother of five children. Her husband owns an electrician shop in which he sells electrical products and provides repair services. He binds the motors coils of washing machines, water pumps and ceiling fans.  For this purpose, he requires a lot of copper cable coils, which are very expensive and out of his purchasing power.

Therefore, Farida requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband can be empowered to buy copper coils to carry on his services. In addition, he wants to buy some extra electric switches, bulbs, bulb holders, sockets etc.

This is the first loan for Farida. She wishes to take a huge loan next time.

loans.use: To buy electric wires, cables, bulbs, switches, and coils to sell.

loans.name: Karemih

texts.en:
Karemih is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the Kiva profile picture in her sewing workshop. 

Karemih is a 47-year-old from Qalqilia. She is a mother to six sons; two of them are workers. For the past year, Karemih has been working in a sewing workshop she owns. It is a profitable project and provides the family a good income. Karemih would like to improve her workshop. 

Karemih took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy two sewing machines. This will enable her to increase her productivity and also her income will be increased.

loans.use: to buy two sewing machines for her sewing workshop

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma, a new client, is married to Kamadi and is from the rural Ntungamo district. 

Fatuma does cattle fattening, however, she has applied for a loan of ugx.1,000,000 to help cultivate land and improve on agriculture. 

She is hard working and resilient, and thanks Kiva for the partnership.

loans.use: To hire labour to cultivate land

loans.name: Gawdensia

texts.en: Gawdensia is a Kiva borrower. She describes herself as experienced. She sells fish to earn a living. She will use the KES 40,000 loan to buy a freezer to store fish from her fish farm and a water tank to store clean water. She hopes that in the future, she will be successful. This is her seventh loan with SMEP DTM. Her previous loans of KES 100,000 were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy a freezer to store fish and a water tank

loans.name: Issabela

texts.en: Issabela is a married woman. She has two children. She describes herself as committed. She will use the KES 30,000 loan to buy a solar panel, solar battery, cables, bulbs and other items for solar installation in their house . They will be able to have lighting in their house and earn some income from charging local residents' mobile phones using the solar energy. She hopes that in the future, she will be able to connect electricity to her home. This is her second loan with SMEP DTM. Her previous loan of KES 20,000 was repaid successfully.

loans.use: buy a solar panel, solar battery, cables, bulbs and other items

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is a 31-year-old married man. He has 2 children ages 2 and 8 years. He describes himself as disciplined and enthusiastic. He will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy cement, sand and other construction materials to construct a base area for a water tank installation. The water tank to be installed will enable them store and access clean water for domestic use. He hopes that in the future, he will be comfortable. This is his second loan with SMEP DTM. The previous loan of KES 20,000 was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and other construction materials

loans.name: Felix

texts.es:
El Sr. Félix es un cliente nuevo de fundación, está acompañado, y comenta que tiene una hija, por quien ambos están luchando y trabajando por darle todo lo que ella necesita para una vida sin privaciones.
El cliente es propietario de una carnicería ya hace más de 20 años, es un señor muy trabajador que con mucho sacrificio ha ido mejorando su negocio, ya que este es el principal sustento de su familia. El está muy agradecido por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo hoy.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de embutidos y carnes, con lo que podrá surtir mayormente su carnicería y seguir ofreciendo buenos productos a sus clientes.
texts.en: Félix is a new client to the foundation.  He has a common-law wife and says that he has a daughter, for whom they are both striving and working in order to give her what she needs to have a life without hardship.  The borrower has owned a butcher shop for over twenty years already.  He is a hardworking gentleman and he has improved his business through much sacrifice because it is his family’s main support. He is very thankful for the opportunity he is receiving today.  He is requesting the loan to purchase sausage and meat, with which he will be able to mainly stock his butcher shop and continue offering good products to his customers.

loans.use: to purchase meat and sausage.

loans.name: Maame

texts.en:
Maame  grew up in poverty without an education, yet this has not stopped her from fulfilling her dream of achieving a better life for her and her family. 

Currently, Maame is an entrepreneur. She prepares and sells "Banku" for a living.   (Banku is a traditional Ghanaian dish using fermented corn/cassava dough that is mixed proportionally and cooked in hot water into a smooth whitish consistent paste.)  She primarily sells her banku in Kufur (near Cape Coast). 

Maame has identified growing demand among consumers for her banku. Nevertheless she is unable to meet their needs because of a limited inventory.  Thus she aims to use her loan to purchase more maize and cassava, therefore enablng her to prepare more of her tasty banku. 

Her business enterprise has grown substantially since she began 10 years ago. She uses the income from her business to help her husband raise their eight children.   With the new profits from her expanded business, Maame wants to buck the trend by ensuring that all her children will have the opportunity to further distance their family from poverty.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of maize and cassava, therefore helping her to prepare more of her tasty ‘Banku'

loans.name: Yassah

texts.en:
Yassah is a 34-year-old business woman from Liberia.  She is married and has four children between 20 and 10; two are in school and live at home.  She describes herself as hard working.

She lives in Nimba, a county in Liberia that shares a border with Guinea and Cote D’Ivoire.  Because of Nimba's status as a border county, trade is the primary activity in the region.  It also has the second highest population in Liberia. 

Yassh has a table business where she has sold slippers for the past two years.  She works 10 hours at her business.  Her greatest challenge in business is too few goods in her shop. She intends to use the loan to buy more slippers for her business. She started her business with money from her mother.  

She likes her business because she makes more profit.  She hopes one day to build a house.  She is grateful for your support!

loans.use: to buy more slippers for her business.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is a  Kiva borrower. She describes herself as highly motivated. Rose operates a retail shop where she sells sugar, cooking oil, cosmetics, and other items to earn an income.

She will use the KES 26,500 loan to buy a water tank to store clean water that will benefit five family members. The family faces a challenge of lack of funds. 

Rose hopes that in the future, she will live happily. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: buy a water tank

loans.name: Josephat

texts.en:
Josephat is a Kiva borrower. He describes himself to be determined. Josephat operates a herbal medicine business where he sells medicine. 

He will use the KES 30,000 loan to buy a water tank that will benefit nine family members. The family faces a challenge of lack of enough water storage facilities. They will be able to store enough water for domestic use.

He hopes that in the future he will grow economically and sustain his family. This is his fourth loan with SMEP DTM; the previous loans of KES 120,000 were repaid successfully.

loans.use: buy a water tank

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a Kiva borrower. He describes himself as ambitious. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorbike. He will use the KES 26,500 loan to buy a water tank that will benefit five family members. The family faces the challenge of lack of enough water storage facilities. He hopes that in the future, he will have a healthy family. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a water tank

loans.name: Urumkan

texts.ru: Урумкан 52 года, замужем, имеет 2 детей (1 дочь и 1 сын). Образование-средне-специальное. Дети находятся на заработках в России и оказывают финансовую поддержку родителям, высылая им деньги ежемесячно. Супруг активно помогает по хозяйству. В целях основного источника доходов Урумкан с 1993 года занимается сельским хозяйством- животноводством и полеводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 1,500 сом (KGS). Ежемесячный доход от хозяйства составляет 8,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Урумкан, на сегодняшний день она имеет в хозяйстве: 2 дойные коровы и 1 лошадь, а также в наличии имеет 0,90 ГА поливной земли, на которой она ежегодно сажает эспарцет и ячмень. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Урумкан обратилась в «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 135,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 1 коровы и 1 лошади. Доходы от кредита Урумкан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества скота, а также в будущем намерена купить мебель.
texts.en:
Urumkan is 52 years old, married, and the mother of two children (one daughter and one son).  She has a secondary-specialized education.  Her children both work in Russia and financially support her and her husband, sending them money every month.  Urumkan's husband also actively helps her run her business.

Urumkan has been involved in agriculture, crop farming and animal husbandry, since 1993, providing her family with its main source of income.  Having started in this business with an initial capital of 1,500 som (KGS), she now makes a monthly income of 8,000 som (KGS) from farming.  Thanks to her tireless work, she now owns two dairy cows and a horse and she also uses 0.9 hectares of irrigated land on which she sows sainfoin and barley every year.

In order to further develop her farming business, Urumkan has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 135,000 som (KGS).  She will use this loan to buy one cow and one horse.  She plans to invest the earnings from this loan into further increasing her livestock headcount.  In the future, she would also like to buy some furniture.

loans.use: to buy one cow and one horse.

loans.name: Grecia Dalila

texts.es:
Grecia es una joven de 23 años, estudia administración de empresas, es casada; el esposo trabaja como motorista y han procreado un hijo de 4 años, aún no asiste a la escuela, viven con ella dos hermanos y su mamá, dependen de ella solamente su hijo.

Su negocio es una tienda, tiene 3 años dedicándose a administrarla, lo aprendió de su esposo que la incentivo. Además, de atender la tienda, ella estudia, esta por egresar de la universidad antes solo estudiaba, un hermano le apoya con la tienda y trabaja en casa.
Con el préstamo comprará más mercadería, como: bebidas, golosinas, granos básicos, porqué se  ha quedado un poco corta de inventario. 

Su objetivo es, graduarse y así  trabajar de su carrera y dejar a su hermano en el negocio de la tienda, con las ganancias espera ir ahorrando para su tesis y así también darle lo que necesita a su hijo.
texts.en:
Grecia, 23, studies business administration and is married.  Her husband works as a driver and they have a four-year old son who does not attend school yet.  Her mother and two brothers live with them but her only dependent is her son.

For three years she has been running a store, having learned to manage it from her husband who encouraged her.  Apart from the store she studies at the university and is about to finish.  One of her brothers helps with the store and works at home.

She will use the loan to buy goods such as drinks, sweets and staples in order to replenish her inventory.

Her goal is to graduate and work in her profession.  She will then let her brother run the store.  With her earnings she hopes to save up for her thesis, and also to give her son everything he needs.

loans.use: To buy drinks, sweets, staples to replenish inventory.

loans.name: Maame

texts.en:
Although she has received no formal education, Maame is an entrepreneur. She specializes in selling second-hand clothes in Kufur (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this enterprise for 11 years. 

Maame is married and has three children.  Her husband works as a corn mill operator. The proceeds from her business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and pay their children’s school fees.  

Maame will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of second-hand clothes, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, she plans to further diversify the type of products she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of second-hand clothes, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales.

loans.name: Theresa

texts.en:
Theresa is divorced and has five children.  As the sole breadwinner in the family, Theresa uses her income to provide for the entire family. 

Even though she did not receive any formal education, Theresa is a successful businesswoman. She prepares and sells "Banku" for a living. (Banku is a traditional Ghanaian dish using fermented corn/cassava dough that is mixed proportionally and cooked in hot water into a smooth whitish consistent paste.) She normally sells her banku in Kufur (near Cape Coast). She has been actively involved in this business for about four  years. 

Theresa will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of maize and cassava, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Theresa plans to further diversify the type of products she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of maize and cassava, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales.

loans.name: Phaminas

texts.en: Phaminas is a Kiva borrower. He describes himself as determined. He will use the KES 26,500 loan to buy a water tank and a gas cooker that will benefit three family members. The tank will enable them to store and access clean water. The family faces a challenge of lack of enough water storage facilities. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a water tank and a gas cooker

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is a 52-year-old married man. He has 5 children with ages ranging from 12 years to 24 years. He describes himself as positive and likes development. He will use the KES 21,000 loan to buy a 3000 litre water tank that will benefit 13 people. The family faces a challenge of water shortage. They will be able to store water and have a surplus of water for domestic use. His business goal is to expand business within 5 years.

loans.use: to buy a 3000 litre water tank

loans.name: Mario Antonio

texts.es:
Mario tiene 28 años de edad,  es bachiller, esta acompañado, su compañera de vida no trabaja se dedica a oficios domésticos y al cuido de sus  tres hijos, dos de ellos estudian el otro está de edad prematura, solo él y su familia viven en casa por lo que son dependientes uno del otro.

Él es empleado en un agro servicio desde hace tres años, inicia su jornada laboral a las 7:00 a.m. y sale a las 5:00 P.m..  A la vez, cultiva la tierra, siembra maíz; esto es un ingreso adicional para la familia.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar abonos, pesticidas y prepara la tierra para el cuidado de 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz del cultivo.

Él espera tener mucha producción y conservar maíz para todo el año. Que le genere un ingreso extra para ahorrar y pagar unas deudas que tiene y darle lo mejor a sus hijos que son quienes más lo necesitan.
texts.en:
Mario is 28 years old and is a high school graduate.  His spouse does not work; she does all the household chores and cares for their three children.  Two of their children study and the other is an infant.  Only he and his family live in the house and therefore they are dependent on each other.

He has been employed for three years in farmland services.  He begins his work day at 7:00 a.m. and leaves at 5:00p.m. At the same time, he cultivates the land and sows corn; this is an extra deposit for the family.

The loan that he is asking Fundación Campo is to buy fertilizers, pesticides and to prepare the land to care for 7,000 square meters of corn harvest.

He hopes to have a lot of production and conserve the corn all year.  He hopes to generate extra deposits to save and pay off debts  that he has and give the best to his children who need it the most.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides and to prepare the land to care for 7,000 square meters of corn harvest.

loans.name: Maria Felipa

texts.es:
La señora María es una persona responsable, trabajadora y honesta, vive con sus hijos en una comunidad de Choluteca, al sur de Honduras, su negocio es la venta de tortillas y tiene varios años de dedicarse a esta actividad.
Doña María el préstamo lo necesita para la compra de maíz, leña y cal para seguir elaborando sus productos, espera que sus ventas aumenten al tener mas productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes que le vistan a diario.
Doña María espera cubrir las necesidades que tiene y mejorar un poco su calidad de vida y la de su familia. En unos años espera que su negocio siga creciendo y se convierta en uno de los negocios más grandes y reconocidos de la zona para poder ayudar a sus hijos a seguir estudiando y que se conviertan en personas de bien con mejores oportunidades en la vida.

Choluteca, Honduras – Agosto 2013
texts.en:
María is a responsible, hard-working, honest person who lives with her children in the community of Choluteca in southern Honduras.  She sells tortillas for a living and has been in business for several years.

María is in need of a loan to buy corn, firewood and limewater to continue making her products.  She wants to increase sales by offering more products to her customers who visit her daily.

María hopes to meet her needs and improve her family's lifestyle.  In a few years she hopes to expand her business and turn it into one of the largest, well-known businesses in the area so she can help her children get ahead, giving them more opportunities in life so they can be good people.


Choluteca, Honduras - August, 2013

loans.use: To buy corn, firewood and limewater for her business.

loans.name: Saidat

texts.en: Saidat is a new client from rural Ruhaama, Ntungamo District.   She is married to Nazil, a tailor, and they have four children.  Saidat wants to buy school materials to help support her children's education, since her husband's income is inadequate. She is innovative and supportive.

loans.use: To buy school materials for her children

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is a 51-year-old married woman. She has 6 children. She describes herself as determined to succeed. She operates a fish business where she sells fish to earn a living. She will use the KES 21,000 loan to buy a 3000 litre water tank that will benefit 8 people. The family faces a challenge of water shortage. They will be able to store and access clean water for domestic use. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a 3000 litre water tank

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is a 47-year-old married woman. She has 6 children. She operates a cereals stall where she sells beans, green grams and other cereals. She will use the KES 21,000 loan to buy a 3000 litre water tank that will benefit 10 people. The family faces a challenge of water shortage. They will be able to store and access clean water. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a 3000 litre water tank

loans.name: Lugmon

texts.ru: Лугмон живет с женой и детьми в районе Шахритус. Ему 48 лет. Он занимается растениеводством. Эту профессию он получил от отца. По сей день Лугмон продолжает свою деятельность и в этом ему помогают его дети. У Лугмона большой опыт в сфере земледелия, более 10 лет. Он хочет продолжить свою деятельность и передать свой опыт своим детям. Он берет кредит для покупки  минеральных удобрений для усовершенствования своего урожая. Лугмон на двух гектаре земельного участка посеял пшеницу и теперь ему необходимо провести обработку земли, чтобы получить качественный урожай пшеницы.
texts.en:
Lugmon, age 48, lives with his wife and children in the Shahrituz district of Tajikistan.  He is involved in agriculture, an occupation he learned from his father and that he is still pursuing, with the help of his children.  He has more than ten years of experience and wants to continue working in agriculture, transmitting his experience to his children.

Lugmon is taking a loan to buy mineral fertilizers which will help him to get a better harvest.  He has sown wheat on two hectares of land and he now needs to fertilize his land in order to get a wheat harvest of good quality.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers to grow wheat.

loans.name: Maria Sonia

texts.es: Doña Sonia es habitante  de la comunidad de las nubes # 2  ella habita en esta comunidad desde hace 2 años  con sus dos hijos una nieta y su esposo. Uno de sus hijos esta en tercer grado de primaria y  va a la escuela de la comunidad  donde no hay energia electrica . Sonia y su esposo trabajan en una finca cafetalera de la comunidad en la temporada de cosecha ademas tambien se dedican  a la compra y destace de cerdos en los fines de semana esto les permite poder recibir  mas ingresos para el hogar ya que su deseo como padres de familia es poder darles lo mejor a sus hijos. Es por eso que necesitan se les de este credito de un pequeño sstema solar , ya que actualmente ellos se iluminan por las noches con candelas o hacen fogatas con leña en el patio de la casa lo que causa mucho humo contaminan el ambiente ademas de ser peligroso por los niños.
texts.en:
Sonia lives in a community called Nubes #2 where she has been living for two years with he two children, husband and a granddaughter.  One of her children is in third grade at the community school where there is no electricity.  Sonia and her husband work on a coffee plantation during the harvest season.  They also work as pork butchers on the weekend which gives them extra income for the household. 

As parents, they want the best for their children and are requesting a loan to buy a small solar energy system.  Currently, they use candles or fires to light the house at night but the fire in the patio produces a lot of smoke which pollutes the air and is dangerous to the children.

loans.use: To buy equipment for home energy.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
El señor Alberto tiene 44 años de edad, es casado  tiene    2 hijos aún pequeños. El está luchando junto a su esposa por sus hijos, ya que quiere darles todo lo que necesitan para poder salir tener una buena vida, educación y vestimenta.
Comenta que para empezar con su negocio recibió ayuda de sus padres gracias a ello pudo comprar algunos productos, gracias al trabajo arduo y a la amabilidad pudo formar su clientela propia. Hoy en día es la única despensa en el lugar y tiene bastantes clientes que siempre van hasta su negocio.
El préstamo solicitado será destinado para la compra de comestibles, bebidas, carnes, verduras y demás, con lo que podrá seguir con sus ventas y generando los ingresos para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en: Alberto is 44 years old, married, and has two children that are still small.  Together, he and his wife are striving for their children because they want to give them all they need to be able to have a good life, education, and clothing.  He says that in order to begin his business, he received help from his parents.  Thanks to their support, he was able to buy some products and thanks to hard work and kindness he was able to establish his own customers.  Today, it is the only pantry in the area and he has many customers that always come to his business.  The requested loan will be used to purchase groceries, beverages, meat, vegetables, and other items, which he will be able to continue selling to generate income to help his family.

loans.use: to purchase groceries, beverages, meat, vegetables, and other items.

loans.name: Mujeres Alegres Group

texts.es:
15 mujeres son las que forman este grupo, como su nombre lo dice, son "Mujeres Alegres" que también trabajan duro para poder ayudar a sus familias por medio del esfuerzo que cada una hace. Sara es una de estas mujeres, quien se dedica a la olería, tiene su fabrica de ladrillos, donde invierte su trabajo, tiempo y capital.
Ella es una persona muy trabajadora, que ha demostrado que quiere salir adelante por el esfuerzo que esta haciendo.
Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de arcilla y de leñas para poder seguir con su oleria y de esa forma tener los ingresos para poder seguir ayudando a su familia. Agradecen todas las integrantes por esta oportunidad que estan recibiendo.
texts.en:
The 15 women who make up this group are as the name says "Mujeres Alegres"  (happy women) who also work hard to help their families through the efforts that each one makes. 

Sara is one of these women. She makes bricks. She has her own brick factory where she invests her time, money and labor. She is a hard-working woman who has demonstrated that she can get ahead by way of her own effort.

Sara is requesting this loan to buy clay and wood so she can continue with her brick-making and have the revenue she needs to support her family. All the members are grateful for this opportunity they are receiving.

loans.use: to buy clay and wood for brick-making.

loans.name: Pauline

texts.en:
Pauline, a married mother of four, describes herself to be outgoing. She operates a stall where she sells fish. 


Pauline has requested her first loan with SMEP DTM for KES 21,000 to buy a 3000 litre water tank that will benefit 10 people. The family faces a challenge of water shortage, so this will enable them to store and access clean water for domestic use.

loans.use: buy a 3000 litre tank

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es:
Blanca tiene 58 años de edad, no tiene ningún grado académico, es viuda, tiene  4 hijos, solamente dos viven con ella, y solo uno de ellos trabaja, el otro pasa en la casa, su madre y su hermano también viven con ella.

Cuenta con 5 años de criar y comercializar ganado, lo aprendió de su difundo esposo, que se dedicaba a lo mismo. También, cultiva maíz, antes vendía licores naturales, trabaja en casa y solo se desplaza en la mañana a las 5 de la madrugada, y regresa a las 3 de la tarde a traer y dejar los animales.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar  dos vacas que serán para la producción de leche, con esto espera elaborar queso y venderlo en la comunidad y así tener también una fuente de alimento más en la casa.

Ella quiere tener muchas vacas en producción de leche y así  dedicarse a la venta de lácteos y  siempre una fuente de ingreso en su hogar.
texts.en:
Blanca, 58, does not have an education.  She is a widow and has four children, but only two live with her.  One of them works and the other stays at home.  Her mother and brother also live with her.

For five years she has been raising and selling cattle.  She learned the trade from her late husband who was in the same business.  She also grows corn and used to sell natural liquors.  She works at home and goes off in the morning at 5:00 a.m., returning at 3:00 p.m., bringing the cattle.

The loan she is requesting through Fundación Campo is to buy two dairy cows to make cheese and sell it in her community.  This will give her extra income at home.

She wants to have many dairy cows so she can sell dairy products and always have an income for the household.

loans.use: To buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
El Sr. Miguel es casado con la señora Susana hace varios años, el es taxista y ella vende ropas. Este es el segundo crédito del Sr. Miguel con Kiva, y agradece porque gracias al anterior pudo ayudar a su esposa en su negocio, hoy solicita de este este crédito para poder reparar la chapearía y pintura de su taxi, para que así pueda seguir dando un buen servicio a sus clientes.
Agradece por la ayuda que esta recibiendo.
texts.en: Miguel has been married to Susan for a number of years. He is a taxi driver and she sells clothes. This is Miguel's second loan with Kiva and he is grateful as he was able to help his wife in her business with the last loan. He is requesting this loan to fix the bodywork and paint his taxi, so he can continue to provide good service to his customers. He is thankful for the help he is receiving.

loans.use: to do bodywork and paint his taxi

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en: Eunice is a 30-year-old married woman. She has 2 children. She describes herself as future oriented and optimistic. She operates a cereals store where she sell maize, beans, rice, etc. She will use the KES 21,000 loan to buy a 3000 litre water tank that will benefit 10 people. The family faces a challenge of water shortage. They will be able to store and access clean water for domestic use. She hopes that in the future, she will build a bigger shop. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a 3000 litre water tank

loans.name: Josesh Farid

texts.en: Josesh, a 30-year-old security guard, lives with his family in his hometown of Imperial. When he is not working, he enjoys playing soccer on the weekends with friends, including his best friend with whom he also works. Josesh successfully completed his high school degree, but was unable to start a post-secondary education in his preferred field, administration. Thanks to the effort put forth by his parents, in combination with Josesh's financial contributions, he was able to finish building most of his house. Josesh is grateful to Kiva lenders, with whose support he will be able to finish plastering the outside of his home.

loans.use: to pay for materials to plaster the facade of his home

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to open a restaurant in his home

loans.name: Johana Vannesa

texts.en: Johana, a resident of Imperial, Peru, is 32 years old and a single mother of a 10-year-old son. Currently, Johana works full time in a laundromat where she says she is successful because of her determination. Having completed only one year of secondary education, Johana wishes she could have studied cosmetology. The most important thing for her now is to increase her income in order to support her family and one day realize her dream -- that her son will become a successful professional. To do so, Johana has started a small candy store out of her own home. She will use this loan to purchase a display case for the candy and sweets that she sells. She is grateful to Kiva lenders for their support and will continue to work hard and persevere each day.

loans.use: to purchase a food display cabinet for her business

loans.name: Renzo Luis

texts.en:
Ica, Peru is located in the Sechura Desert about four hours south of Lima, the country's capital, and is hailed by Peruvians as "The Land of the Sun." It is known in Peru for its frequent earthquakes (an 8.4 in 2001 and 8.0 in 2007), its production of grapes, asparagus, and olives, and perhaps most notably, as the source of Peruvian's traditional national drink, Pisco.

In this hot, arid climate resides Renzo, a father of a 2-year-old child. Renzo works full time as a motorbike taxi driver ("mototaxi"), offering his passengers efficiency and security. He transports approximately 15 people per day. In order to maintain his provision of excellent service and safety, he needs to pay for a few fixes to his mototaxi. Renzo will use this loan to change the doors and tires, as well as pay for general maintenance of the vehicle. He hopes that these fixes will help increase his income, which then will allow him to finish building his house -- a dream he hopes to realize within the next year.

loans.use: to cover the maintenance costs of his motorbike taxi

loans.name: Tina

texts.en:
Tina is a 57-year-old married woman with 4 children. 
She has a small plantation and grows taro, banana, yam, and breadfruit to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Tina has requested a loan to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, bush-knives, a chain saw, and a wheelbarrow. 
She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Tina will save up for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a backpack sprayer, chemicals, bush-knives, a chain saw, and a wheelbarrow.

loans.name: Eleitino

texts.en:
Eleitino is a 32-year-old who lives with her partner and 2 children. 
She has a small plantation and grows taro, banana, and yam to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Eleitino has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a backpack sprayer, fertilizer and barbed wire. to buy chemicals,wheelbarrow,backpack sprayer,fertilizer and barbed wire. 
She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Eleitino hopes to support her family's daily wants and needs.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a wheelbarrow, a backpack sprayer, fertilizer and barbed wire.

loans.name: Faaiuga

texts.en: Faaiuga is 32 years old and lives with her partner and 2 children. She runs a small business selling pork cakes and pancakes in her village school during breaks and has been doing this for more than 3 years. Faaiuga has requested a loan to buy flour, oil, soy sauce, yeast, and a frying pan. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Faaiuga will used it to support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil, soy sauce, yeast and a frying pan.

loans.name: Asri Lestari Group

texts.en:
Ni Nyoman is the head of the Asri Lestari group, which is located in west Bali, near the border between Bali and Java. Although most inhabitants there work as a fishermen, the Balinese women still maintain cultural ties to raising pigs for supporting the family income. Ni Nyoman has 2 children and her husband works as a mason.

She will use her loan to purchase 3 superior piglets and feed. Her plan is to manage fattening the piglets. She hopes the price for pigs remains high and she can earn a satisfactory profit. One member could not attend the meeting because she went to the Temple.

loans.use: To purchase three superior piglets and feed

loans.name: Davaadorj

texts.en: Mr. Davaadorj, 36 years old, lives with his wife, daughter, son and mother in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land. He has been driving a truck at a transportation service company since 2011. His wife is a nurse at a hospital. Recently, he purchased a container and transformed it into a house by carving out a window frame and door. In order to create a complete house, which will accommodate all of the family members, he needs to purchase another container. For this reason, he is requesting a loan of 4,000,000 MNT. Conjoining two containers, he will make a comfortable and warm house. The new house will enable the family to burn less coal for heating thus releasing less pollutants into the atmosphere.

loans.use: to purchase another container

loans.name: Enrique Octavio

texts.en: Enrique, a 19-year-old quarry worker, resides in the city of Nazca -- a place famous for the legendary Nazca Lines. When Enrique is not hard at work, he enjoys playing soccer with his friends. He has completed his secondary education and hopes to be able to study psychology in the future. Enrique is incredibly grateful to Kiva lenders, whose loan will be used to cover some of the costs he will incur in order to paint his bedroom. This will allow Enrique to feel more comfortable in his own home, which he shares with his family. Enrique's biggest desire is to one day become a homeowner himself.

loans.use: to cover part of the costs of painting his bedroom

loans.name: José Raúl

texts.es:
José es un joven de 27 años de edad, estudio hasta 9° grado, es casado, la esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene un hijo de 4 años aun no estudia, junto con ellos vive su mamá. 

Desde hace 3 años trabaja en  la agricultura, lo aprendió de su padre que desde niño lo llevaba a trabajar, también cría y vende cerdos y bovinos. Para ir a su cultivo se desplaza unos 2 kilómetros, se levanta a las 4 a.m  y regresa a casa a las 1pm


El préstamo que esta solicitando es, para comprar un  novillo para hacer la monta, con esto podrá surquear la tierra y hacer otras actividades con los bueyes y evitar esos costos; ya que ese servicio es bastante costoso

Espera ganar muchas ganancias, con la compra del novillo, debido a que en su hogar desea tener todo lo básico para que su esposa e hijo no les falte nada, en su producción quiere a futuro comprar más bovinos de leche.
texts.en: José is a young 27 year old man.  He completed ninth grade and he is married.  His wife is engaged in housekeeping and they have a four year old son that is not in school yet.  His mother lives with them.  For three years, José has worked in farming, which he learned from his father who took him to work when he was a child.  He also raises pigs and cattle.  To reach his crop, he travels about two kilometers; he rises at 4:00 am and returns home at 1:00 pm.  He is requesting the loan to purchase a young bull for mating.  He will be able to use the bull to plough the land and do other chores with the wagons and avoid these costs as that service is quite expensive.  He hopes to earn a great deal of profits with the purchase of the bull because he wants to have all the basics in his home so that his wife and son don’t lack anything.  He wants to buy more dairy cattle for future production.

loans.use: to purchase a young bull for mating.

loans.name: José Adilman

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 60 años de edad, lastimosamente no pudo asistir a la escuela, está acompañado, y su compañera de vida ella realiza los oficios domésticos, tiene tres hijos, pero solo están con él, los nietos. 

 
Tiene 42 años de trabajar en la agricultura lo ha desempeñado, casi toda su vida por lo que goza de muchísima experiencia; fue aprendido por su padre, también tiene bovinos los cuales engorda y posterior vende ,trabaja desde las 4 AM y llega a las 2 PM ya que camina  1KM.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar una yunta de novillos, los cuales le servirán para los trabajos agrícolas ahorrándose mucho dinero.

Su deseo es, seguir trabajando siempre en la agricultura y criar bovinos para generar ingresos y que su esposa este con salud; ya que padece de una enfermedad y debe estar siempre en control medico.
texts.en:
José is 60 years old, married and his life partner is a domestic worker. He has three children but only his grandchildren live with him. Unfortunately he could not attend school. He has been working in agriculture for 42 years, almost all his life. So he has a lot of experience. He learned from his father. He also has cattle which he fattens and sells. He has to walk 1 kilometer to work and works from 4am until 2pm.

The loan he is requesting is to buy a pair of oxen, which will help with the farming chores and save a lot of money. His wish is to continue working in agriculture, raising cattle to generate income and that his wife gets better. She has been sick and has been receiving medical attention.

loans.use: to buy a pair of oxen, which will help with the farming chores and save a lot of money.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en: Jacinta is 39 years old and married with 4 children. She runs a small business selling pancakes in her community and has been doing this for more than 3 years years. Jacinta has requested a loan to buy flour, sugar, oil, an oven, plastic bags, and baking soda. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Jacinta will save more money for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, oil, an oven, plastic bags, and baking soda.

loans.name: Segia

texts.en:
Segia is a 32-year-old married woman with 5 children. 
She has a small plantation and grows taro, banana, and yam to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Segia has requested a loan to buy a wheelbarrow, a backpack sprayer, barbed wire, and chemicals. She has been a member of SPBD since 2012. With her profits, Segia will renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy a wheelbarrow, a backpack sprayer, barbed wire, and chemicals.

loans.name: Tofiga

texts.en:
Tofiga is a 38-year-old married woman with 5 children. 

She has a small plantation and grows taro, banana, and vegetables in a garden to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Tofiga has requested a loan to buy a shovel, chemicals, backpack sprayer, fertilizer, vegetable seeds and taro roots.
 
She joined SPBD in 2013 to gain access to financial services. With her profits, Tofiga will support her family financially.

loans.use: to buy a shovel, chemicals, backpack sprayer, fertilizer, vegetable seeds and taro roots

loans.name: Battsengel

texts.en: Mrs. Battsengel, 44 years old, lives with her husband, daughter and niece in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family is currently living in a garage because their house roof and wall is so fragile. She has been mending shoes for a living for about 10 years. Even though her husband's leg is paralyzed, he helps his wife in many ways. Her daughter works at a land register company. As winter is approaching, she wants to renovate her old house because living in the garage in winter is impossible. So she is requesting a loan of 6,000,000 MNT to purchase building materials such as shingles, cement, bricks, planks, fiberglass and foam as well as vacuum insulated windows and hardwood flooring. By doing so, her family will live in a comfortable and warm place as no heat will seep though the walls again. More importantly, they will burn less coal for heating, thus releasing fewer pollutants into the air. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase shingles, cement, bricks, planks and fiberglass

loans.name: Tirta Nadi Group

texts.en: In order to further enhance their earnings in the field of breeding pigs, the whole group of Tirta Nadi wishes to continue borrowing from MUK in the same amount. They are very satisfied with the services provided, so they agreed to develop this business further. The group chose a new head, Ni Nyoman, and replaced Ni Komang. Ni Nyoman plans to use the loan to buy four superior quality piglets for later sale. The price of pigs remains high. She still expects the assistance of MUK in business consulting. Her profits will be saved for the preparation of her children's education expenses.

loans.use: to purchase four superior piglets

loans.name: Rosa Mistica Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Rosa Mistica está en su Segundo ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas se comprometieron a trabajar y a ayudarse entre todas para salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde una de las dieciséis señoras se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir con ingresos muy bajos, pero trabajando por mejorarlo
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Liliana, quien a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y las aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa ella desea mejorar  su situación de pobreza. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropas, y comenta que la competencia es dura, pero que no se desanima, ya que es la única forma que tiene de ayudar a su familia.
Ella pide esta ayuda para comprar prendas de invierno, ya que estamos en temporada invernal y quiere seguir con sus ventas, que es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
The Rosa Mistica group is in their second cycle with the women's committee program, where they all promise to work together and help each other to move forward.  They are participating in the poverty elimination survey and one of the sixteen women was found to be below the poverty line, with low income, but working to improve it.

One of the group members is Liliana, who wants to improve her poverty situation with effort, continuous work, and the application of the vital behaviors of a successful woman.  She works selling clothing and says that the competition is hard, but it does not discourage her, since this is the only way she has to help her family.

She is requesting this help to purchase winter clothing since it is winter time and she wants to continue with her sales, since it is her only source of income.

loans.use: to purchase winter clothing to sell.

loans.name: Kanykey

texts.ru: Каныкей 21 год, незамужем, проживает с родителями. У Каныкей неоконченное-высшее высшее образование. Каныкей в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, с 2009 года занимается торговлей продуктов питания, начав этот бизнес с 30,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Каныкей, она смогла развить и расширить свой товар, ее деятельность приносит около 15,000 сом KGS в месяц, что служит основой для покрытия расходов на питание и бытовые нужды семьи. Доходы от бизнеса позволили Каныкей расширить свой товарооборот. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Каныкей обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку оптовых продуктов питания для дальнейшей перепродажи. Доходы от кредита помогут Каныкей увеличить товарооборот в продуктовом магазине, а также полученная прибыль поможет улучшить благосостояние семьи.
texts.en:
Kanykey is 21 and single and lives with her parents. She has an unfinished higher education. Kaneykey is the primary income earner in her family and has been engaged in selling food products since 2009, having begun her business with 30,000 KGS. Thanks to Kanykey's hard work, she has been able to develop and expand her business, and her activities bring in about 15,000 KGS per month, which is the main source of payment for her family's groceries and other everyday needs. 

Profits from Kanykey's business have allowed her to broaden her turnover of inventory. With the goal of further development of her business, Kanykey has turned to microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan of 100,000 KGS to purchase wholesale food products for further resale. Profits from the loan will help Kanykey to increase turnover of inventory in her grocery store; revenue received will also help improve her family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy wholesale food products for resale

loans.name: Freddy Antonio

texts.es: Freddy es un ciudadano de la comunidad de las nubes # 2 tiene de vivir en esta comnunidad mas de 4 años. En su humilde vivienda vive con su esposa y su hijo de 7 años de edad  el esta en segundo grado de primaria  y asiste a la escuela de la misma comunidad. Freddy para mantener a su familia trabaja en una finca  como jornalero esto le permite poder llevar el sustento del dia dia a su hogar ya que el ingreso del trabajo es fijo. Por las noches en su humilde hogar  se iluminan con candiles candelas lo que es peligroso y perjudicial para la salud especialmente del niño y  gasta a diario en la compra de estos. Es por eso que el solicita se  le ayude en darle el prestamo de este pequeño sistema solar de 12 Watt que le permitira poder tener luz en su hogar compartir con la familia y ayudar en los labores del hogar .
texts.en:
Freddy is a citizen of the community of Las Nubes #2. He has lived in this community for more than four years. In his modest home he lives with his wife and his seven-year-old son, who is in second grade of primary, and attends school in the same community. 

To support his family, Freddy works on a farm as a day laborer. This enables him to support his household, as he has a steady work income.

In the evenings in his modest home the lighting is by candles, which is dangerous and harmful to health; especially that of the children, and he has the expense of buying these every day. That is why he is requesting the help of a loan to buy a small 12-watt solar energy system which will enable him to have light in his home to share with the family and help with the household chores.

loans.use: To buy a solar energy system for his home.

loans.name: Batbayar

texts.en: Mr. Batbayar, 25 years old, lives with his mother in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. He has been rendering taxi service to the local people for eight months. Before this, he worked as a truck driver at a copper mine but he quit his job because his mother lived alone in Ulaanbaatar. Using his previous loan, he purchased and installed a heating system in his house. But it was not enough to protect them from the cold winter, and it consumed too much energy. Now he is requesting a loan of 5,000,000 MNT to purchase building and insulation materials, such as bricks, cement, fiberglass and foam in order to repair and insulate his wooden house. As a result, he and his mother will live in a comfortable and warm place where they won't need to burn a lot of coal for heating, which will have a positive impact on the environment as less pollutants will be released into the air.

loans.use: to puchase building and insulation materials

loans.name: Mendsaikhan

texts.en: Mendsaikhan, 35, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in a Mongolian traditional ger (portable felt dwelling) on a plot of land. He has been transporting goods within the city since 2011. His wife is currently unemployed and looks after their children. Their children both go to elementary school. He is requesting a loan of 2000000 MNT to purchase furniture such as a fridge, a desk and chairs. By doing so, his family will live in a more comfortable place. This borrower is a very hardworking individual who cares deeply for his family.

loans.use: to purchase furniture such as a fridge, a desk and chairs.

loans.name: Zarina

texts.ru: Зарина современная и жизнерадостная молодая девушка. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Зарина более полтора года работает на местном радио. Зарина работает диктором. Она введет развлекательные программы на радио. Зарина в этом году поступила в Таджикский Государственный Университет. Зарина поступила на юридический факультет. Зарина должна оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Zarina is a modern and vivacious young woman. She is not married and lives with her parents. Zarina has been working at the local radio station as a director for more than a year and a half. She introduces entertaining radio shows. This year, Zarina has enrolled in the Faculty of Law at Tajik State National University. She needs to pay for her tuition, but doesn't have the money and is requesting a loan for tuition payments. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: To pay for her university tuition

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve the facade of her home.

loans.name: Allen

texts.en: Allen is a 46-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has 4 children. The oldest child is 24 while the youngest is 7. She engages in farming. She grows and sells rice. She has been growing rice for almost 10 years. Allen lacks the capital to sustain her farming activity. She requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy fertilizers and more rice seedlings and pay the laborer's fee to improve her harvest. In the future, Allen would like to expand her farming business to support the college education of her children.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and more rice seedlings and pay the laborer's fee

loans.name: Lay

texts.en:
Lay is a married woman of 49 who currently lives with her spouse and two unmarried children in Baray District, Kampong Thom Province. She is dedicated to her farming business, growing rice and cassava on her own land. She feels glad and lucky to have the support of her spouse and children, who are helping her with the farming activities. Farming is the sole source of her income, and she has been doing it for nearly 25 years.

Lay intends to use the loan to buy wood to renovate her old house. For this reason, she applied for a loan amounting to KHR 3,000,000 through HKL, one of Kiva partners. She has had six loans from HKL and has been recognized as a client with a good credit history. She thanks the lenders for the loan support to help her family.

loans.use: to buy wood to renovate her old house.

loans.name: Muhibakhon

texts.ru: Мухибахону 37 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Она работает врач -гинекологом. Ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации. Мухибахон всегда мечтала дать высшее образование своим детям. Ее сын Азамджон в этом году окончил среднюю школу и поступил в Государственный Медицинский Университет Таджикистана. Азамджон отлично учился в средней школе и успешно поступил в университет. Мухибахон запрашивает займ на сумму 2600 долларов США для оплаты учебного договора. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Muhibakhon is 37 and married and raising three children. She works as a gynecologist and her husband is a migrant worker in Russia. Muhibakhon has always dreamed of offering her children a higher education. Her son Azamdzhon graduated from secondary school this year with excellent grades and has successfully enrolled in the State Medical University of Tajikistan. Muhibakhon is requesting a loan of US$2,600 to pay for his tuition. She awaits your kindness and hopes for your charity.

loans.use: To pay for her son's university tuition

loans.name: Iván Leonel

texts.es: Iván es una persona muy trabajadora quien se dedica a la fontanería, albañilería y a pintar casas, atendiendo trabajos a lo largo del país para poder llevar de esta manera el alimento y todo lo necesario a su hogar, donde vive junto a su esposa quien trabaja realizando los quehaceres del hogar y así mismo vive junto a su pequeño hijo de cinco años de edad. A pesar de trabajar tan duro y de todos sus esfuerzos, Iván no ha podido reunir el dinero necesario para cambiar el techo de su hogar, por lo que en cada lluvia su casa y familia se ve afectada, así mismo desea mandar a hacer un muro de contención ya que existen varios paredones de tierra que ponen en riesgo la vida de su familia. Es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo a FUSAI para poder contar con el dinero necesario para comprar dos docenas y media de láminas y también para comprar los materiales necesarios para iniciar la construcción del muro de contención. Con esto Iván brindará una vida mejor a su familia, estable y segura.
texts.en: Ivan is a hardworking person who works as a plumber, as a mason, and as a house painter.  He works all over the country so that he can feed and provide for the needs of his household, where he lives with his wife, who works as a housewife and cares for their five year old son.  Even though he has worked hard and made a great effort, Ivan has not been able to save up the money necessary to replace the roof on his home, so his family is affected whenever it rains.  He also wants to build a retention wall, since there are a number of dirt mounds that place his family at risk.  For this reason he is asking for a loan through FUSAI, to be able to have the money necessary to buy two and a half dozen sheets of metal and also to buy the materials needed to begin building the retention wall.  With this, Ivan will be able to provide his family with a better, more stable quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal.

loans.name: Anacleto

texts.en: Anacleto is a 55-year-old married man from Talibon, Bohol. He has 5 children. The oldest child is 23 while the younget is 8. He engages in fishing. He has been fishing for almost 10 years. He requested a loan of 23,000 PHP to buy fishing materials, such as fishing net, nylon and rope, to increase his catch and improve his earnings. In the future, Anacleto hopes that he can improve his fishing business to be successful so that he could provide his children with both good food and a quality education.

loans.use: to buy fishing materials like fishing net, nylon and  ropes

loans.name: Yesenia Marisol

texts.es:
Yesenia es una mujer de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta 9° grado, esta casada, y su esposo se dedica a la carpintería, tiene dos hijos con edades de 13 y 8 años están estudiando, solo vive con su esposo e hijos, solo los dos hijos depende de ella.

Lleva 10 años en el comercio de ropa, pasteles, frescos, pupusas etc, aprendió por intuición propia, antes solo comercializaba ropa, vende  sus productos por todo el cantón lo hace a pie, le apoyan sus hijos y lo hace de 1:00 p.m. a 5 p.m. todos los días. 

El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar ropa especialmente de mujer; ya que cuando anda con la venta de pasteles la gente le pregunta por ropa, así ella podrá aprovechar de vender las dos cosas y generar más ganancias.

Si todo le funciona con la ropa, espera tener un canal de comercio mas grande y dedicarse solo a esa actividad y así con las ganancias podrá mantener a sus hijos y ayudar a su esposo que se encuentra mal de salud.
texts.en:
Yesenia is a 37 year old woman. She studied until Grade Nine. She is married, her husband is a carpenter. She has two children, aged 13 and 8, who attend school. She lives with her husband and children and the children depend on her support. 

Yesenia has been selling clothes, pastries, soft drinks and pupusas (a traditional food) etc. for more than 10 years. She learned her trade by intuition, at first she only sold clothing. She sells throughout her canton on foot. Her children help her. She sells from 1pm until 5pm every day. 

Yesenia will use the loan to buy clothing, especially woman's clothing. While she is out selling pupusas, people ask her for clothing. So she can take advantage of this selling both things and increase her revenues. If the clothes selling goes well, she hopes to create a larger business and just sell clothes. She would use the revenue to support her children and help her husband as he has been sick.

loans.use: to buy clothing, mainly for women.

loans.name: German

texts.es:
German tiene 37 años de edad, solo estudio hasta noveno grado es acompañado y tiene 5 hijos. Se dedica  a la crianza de bovinos los cuales comercializa, tiene 17 años trabajar en la agricultura. Sus hijos le apoyan en el trabajo, desde las  4 de la madrugada  hasta las doce del día.

El cliente desde los 17 años es independiente en el trabajo y lo aprendió de su padre, antes se dedicaba al comercio. Camina 2km diarios hacia donde tiene el cultivo.

El crédito que esta solicitando es para comprar abono y prepara la tierra para sembrar 10,500 metros cuadrados de terreno. Así generara una cosecha que le sirva tanto para tener ingresos económicos e insumos en su hogar.

El cliente quiere tener una buena producción, que le permita vender una parte para honrar la deuda con la Fundacion Campo, y a la vez darle a sus hijos lo necesario para que puedan crecer, sanos, fuertes, y con una buena educación, y si es posible comprar un bovino que le quede de ganancia.
texts.en:
German is 37 years old. He only went to school up to the ninth grade. He is married and has 5 children. He raises cattle that he sells and has been working in agriculture for 17 years. His children help him in his work from 4 in the morning until 12 noon. 

This client has been on his own at work for 17 years. He learned it from his family. Previously he worked as a merchant. He works 2 km a day to where he has his crop.  

The loan that he is asking for is to buy fertilizer and to prepare the soil to plant 10,500 square meters of land. This way, he will generate a harvest that will be used for income and for home consumption.

The client wants to have a good yield that will allow him to sell a portion to pay off the debt with Fundacion Campo as well as give his children what they need to grow up healthy, strong and well educated, and if possible buy a cow for profit.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to prepare the soil to plant 10,500 square meters of land.

loans.name: Ubadat

texts.ru: Убадат 44 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. У Убадат - среднее образование. Убадат в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 7,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Убадат, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 головы крупного рогатого скота, а также 10 голов мелкого рогатого скота, ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Убадат обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение поголовья скота за счет покупки крупного рогатого скота. Доходы от кредита Убадат планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, а также улучшить благосостояние семьи.
texts.en: Ubadat is 44 and married and, together with her husband, raising five children. Ubadat has a secondary education. As the primary income earner for her family, Ubadat works raising livestock, something she began 20 years ago with the purchase of cattle for 7,000 KGS. Thanks to Ubadat's hard work, her farm currently has two head of big-horned cattle as well as 10 head of small-horned cattle, with monthly earnings at 10,000 KGS. With the goal of further expanding her farm, Ubadat has turned to microfinance bank "Bai Tushum and Partners" for a loan of 100,000 KGS to increase her head count by purchasing big-horned cattle. Profits from the loan will be invested into increasing her household's number of cattle, as well as improving her family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Nueva  Generacion - Sayllapata Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de pobladores en la comunidad de Sayllapata formaron el banco comunal “Nueva  Generacion - Sayllapata” en la provincia de Paucartambo desde este año 2013. En esta comunidad no existen industrias, empresas, bancos pero existen grandes terrenos de cultivos por lo tanto la mayoría de los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.    

Santusa tiene 51 años de edad y nació en el poblado de Sayllapata y vive en la misma comunidad, ella es una persona responsable y amable que sale adelante pues su actividad económica principal es la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, gallinas, chanchos y también se dedica a la agricultura entonces tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde siembra papa, cebada, trigo y habas, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más animales menores como cuyes y gallinas para incrementar su capital de negocio.

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos.

(La señora de falda roja es esposa de uno de los socios del banco comunal).

(La comunidad de Sayllapata está ubicado en el distrito de Colquepata de la provincia de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco, Perú).
texts.en: A group of residents from the community of Sayllapata formed the "Nueva Generacion - Sayllapata" communal bank in the province of Paucartambo in 2013.  There are no industries, businesses or banks in the community.  However there are large agricultural fields, so the majority of the population works in agriculture and livestock farming.  Santusa is 51 years old, and was born and still lives in the community of Sayllapata. She is a responsible and friendly person who is successful in her principal economic activity, which is raising small animals such as guinea pigs, chickens and pigs, and also works in agriculture.  She has several fields where she grows potatoes, barley, wheat and broad beans.  She needs a loan now to buy more small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens, in order to increase her business capital.  The members are grateful for the opportunity provided and commit to making their respective repayments within the specified time period.  (The woman in the red skirt is the wife of one of the communal bank members.) (The community of Sayllapata is located in the Colquepata district, in the province of Paucartambo, in the department of Cusco, Peru.)

loans.use: to buy more small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Francisco Arnoldo

texts.es:
Francisco es un hombre de 54 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, tiene 7 hijos, solo una hija vive con él esta estudiando enfermería.

Tiene 35 años de experiencia en la agricultura, desde que tenia 12 años;  lo aprendió a su padre que se dedicaba a lo mismo, también cría bovinos para la venta y toda la vida se ha dedicado a la agricultura, se levanta a las 4 de la madrugada todos los días y recorre una distancia de 1 km para su trabajo.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para preparara la tierra y compra de abono para cultivar maíz. Con esto  podrá aplicar los insumos a tiempo, para que la cosecha sea buena  y le permita asegurar el grano tanto para consumo familiar como para la venta. 

Él tiene la confianza de obtener una muy buena producción y ganancias ya que tiene dos hijos por graduarse y quiere apoyarles hasta en las últimas instancias, ya que ese siempre ha sido el sueño de él, y trabajar con bovinos en grandes cantidades.
texts.en:
